## Class type

Matches a \[`class` constructor\](https://developer.mozilla.org/en-US/docs/Web/JavaScript/Reference/Classes).

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
export declare type Class<T = unknown, Arguments extends any[] = any[]> = new(...arguments_: Arguments) => T;
```
